properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for signing JWT tokens.

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds.

properties.name: cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins.

properties.name: cloudinary.cloud-name
properties.description: Cloudinary cloud name for image storage.

properties.name: tesseract.datapath
properties.description: Path to the Tesseract tessdata directory.

properties.name: tesseract.jna.library.path
properties.description: JNA library path for the Tesseract native library. Leave empty to use system library path.

properties.name: gemini.api.model
properties.description: Google Gemini model name to use.
